name: Fashion Rainbow Horse Rider
description:
Welcome to the Rainbow Horse Caring Beauty Salon! Discover the magic of this pony dress up fairy tale! Let the tooth fairy guide you through the levels of this amazing adventure! In this makeover game for kids, you can take care of a unicorn, comb its hair and ride a magic pony... Everything is possible in the kingdom of the Rainbow Horse!

Start living these horse caring and pony dress up adventures for girls now! Help the princess to have all the rainbow animals ready and perfect. Clean the stable to make sure the horses are confortable and can received all the horse caring they need.

After playing a lot in the unicorn land, the horses are dirty and need to be cleaned a groomed. Wash the pretty pony and comb her mane in this makeover and beauty salon. Use some perfume once you are done, unicorns and horses love to smell good!

Take care of the rainbow unicorn hovees too. It is important to have strong and healthy legs to be able to run and play all over this magic land. And in this fairy tale beauty salon we can take care of all aspects of the pony and horse families! We love the horse caring so clean the hoof and change the magic horse shoe to make your unicorn shine again!

Once you have finished in the beauty salon, it is time to dress up our lovely pony! The carriage is ready and now you can dress up and makeup your rainbow pony or magic unicorn to finish with the horse caring and live new adventures!

Features of this rainbow horse caring and pony dress up beauty salon:
- Unicorn and magic horse games: work smooth on different devices and resolutions.
- One of the best horse caring games for kids!
- Beauty salon game for girls of all ages!
- Play with different members of the pony and unicorn families.
- Amazing graphics and atmosphere!
- Share your creations with friends and family!

If you love horses and unicorns, then this is your horse caring game! Start playing now and live a princess fairy tale adventure of caring, hair makeover and dress up beauty salon like no other! The horses of this magical rainbow land are waiting for you! Come and meet them in this amazing beauty salon!
